verses.verse: שִׁ֗יר <WH7892> Shir, A Song הַֽמַּ֫עֲל֥וֹת <WH4609> ham-Ma-'a-Lot of degrees אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh unto the LORD בַּצָּרָ֣תָה <WH6869> batz-tza-Ra-tah In my distress לִּ֑י Li; קָ֝רָ֗אתִי <WH7121> ka-Ra-ti, I cried וַֽיַּעֲנֵֽנִי׃ <WH6030> Vai-ya-'a-Ne-ni. and he heard

יְֽהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh O LORD הַצִּ֣ילָה <WH5337> hatz-Tzi-lah Deliver נַ֭פְשִׁי <WH5315> Naf-shi my soul מִשְּׂפַת־ <WH8193> mis-se-fat- lips שֶׁ֑קֶר <WH8267> She-ker; from lying מִלָּשׁ֥וֹן <WH3956> mil-la-Shon tongue רְמִיָּֽה׃ <WH7423> re-mi-Yah. [and] from a deceitful

מַה־ <WH4100> mah- What יִּתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> yit-Ten What shall be given לְ֭ךָ Le-cha וּמַה־ <WH4100> u-mah- and what יֹּסִ֥יף <WH3254> yo-Sif unto thee;or what shall be done לָ֗ךְ Lach, לָשׁ֥וֹן <WH3956> la-Shon babbler רְמִיָּֽה׃ <WH7423> re-mi-Yah. unto thee thou false

חִצֵּ֣י <WH2671> chitz-Tzei arrows גִבּ֣וֹר <WH1368> gib-Bor of the mighty שְׁנוּנִ֑ים <WH8150> she-nu-Nim; Sharp עִ֝֗ם <WH5973> 'Im, With גַּחֲלֵ֥י <WH1513> ga-cha-Lei with coals רְתָמִֽים׃ <WH7574> re-ta-Mim. of juniper

אֽוֹיָה־ <WH190> o-yah- Woe לִ֭י li כִּי־ <WH3588> ki- for גַ֣רְתִּי <WH1481> Gar-ti is me that I sojourn מֶ֑שֶׁךְ <WH4902> Me-shech; in Mesech שָׁ֝כַ֗נְתִּי <WH7931> Chan-ti, [that] I dwell עִֽם־ <WH5973> 'im- among אָהֳלֵ֥י <WH168> 'o-ho-Lei in the tents קֵדָֽר׃ <WH6938> ke-Dar. of Kedar

רַ֭בַּת <WH7227> Rab-bat hath long שָֽׁכְנָה־ <WH7931> sha-che-nah- dwelt לָּ֣הּ lah נַפְשִׁ֑י <WH5315> naf-Shi; My soul עִ֝֗ם <WH5973> 'Im, who שׂוֹנֵ֥א <WH8130> so-Ne with him that hateth שָׁלֽוֹם׃ <WH7965> sha-Lom. peace

אֲ‍ ֽנִי־ <WH589> 'ani-Sha- I am שָׁ֭לוֹם <WH7965> lom I [am for] peace וְכִ֣י <WH3588> ve-Chi when אֲדַבֵּ֑ר <WH1696> 'a-dab-Ber; but when I speak הֵ֝֗מָּה <WH1992> Hem-mah, are for לַמִּלְחָמָֽה׃ <WH4421> lam-mil-cha-Mah. they [are] for war
